home.paragraphs: I design and develop modern web applications with a strong focus on performance, usability, and maintainable code.
home.AboutMe: My name is Masoud Jafari. I am a 22-year-old self-taught frontend developer based in Tehran, Iran. I specialize in building responsive and user-friendly web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and React.js. Frontend development aligns with all of my passionsâ€”it combines creativity and problem-solving with teamwork and management skills. I enjoy the fast-paced evolution of modern web technologies and continuously explore new frameworks and tools to improve my craft.
home.MySkillsSubtitle: Technologies and abilities I use to build modern web applications
